scripts.debug:mac: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug && cd ../ && cp ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk eCommerce_$(date +'%m_%d_%Y').apk && open .
scripts.debug: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug && cd ../ && copy android/app/build/outputs/apk/debug/app-debug.apk eCommerce.apk && start .
scripts.bundle:mac: cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease && cd ../ && cp ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab ./eCommerce.aab && open .
scripts.bundle: cd android && gradlew bundleRelease && cd ../ && cp ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab ./eCommerce.aab && start .
scripts.release:mac: cd android && ./gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ../ && cp ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ./eCommerce_$(date +'%m_%d_%Y').apk && open .
scripts.release: cd android && gradlew app:assembleRelease && cd ../ && cp ./android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk ./eCommerce_$(date +'%m_%d_%Y').apk && start .
